thread.title: NYPD: Orthodox Jewish Man Assaulted In WIlliamsburg
thread.title_full: NYPD: Orthodox Jewish Man Assaulted In WIlliamsburg

author: Mark Hirshberg
title: NYPD: Orthodox Jewish Man Assaulted In WIlliamsburg
text:
Share 
A orthodox jewish man was assaulted a short time ago in the williamsburg section of brooklyn and cops are investigating as a possible bias assault. 
The Man identified by sources as moshe yehuda feldman, 35-years-old was walking on wallabout avenue, just after 11;20am, when he was assaulted by a hispanic male who did not make any statements cops said. 
The Suspect approached the hasidic man and assaulted him in the head causing the jewish man to suffer injuries to his head, A NYPD official told JP. 
The suspect who was wearing a blue shirt fled from the scene, and Police responded for the investigation. 
The NYPD 90 princet has called in the Hate Crimes Task Force.
